relations.target: suit: a set of garments (usually including a jacket and trousers or skirt) for outerwear all of the same fabric and color; 'they buried him in his best suit' <i59760>
fur: dense coat of fine silky hairs on mammals (e.g., cat or seal or weasel) <i45307>
costume: the attire worn in a play or at a fancy dress ball; 'he won the prize for best costume' <i52396>
